page.title: 07A Day in my life in Bristol
page.content: On Tuesday, I woke up at 8 a.m., and went downstairs for breakfast. After that I cleaned my teeth and washed, then I got dressed and went to school. At 9.30 a.m. it is Junior hymn practice, then it is swimming, after which we do Maths., English and Story. At 12 p.m. we have lunch. We play afterwards. Then we work and play till hometime. I go to my friend's house. We either play on his computer or watch T.V. Then we have tea. At 4.45 p.m. I change into my football kit, then I play until football training begins at 6 p.m. It is hard but I enjoy it. We finish at 7.30 p.m. and I go home with my dad. At 8.20 p.m. we arrive home; I have a shower and something to eat and at 9 p.m. it is time for bed.
